comment: игрока накрывают галлюцинации на арене, он баркает сам

languages.text: Звуки закольцовываются в страшную петлю самоповтора, со скрежетом смешиваются, становятся высокими и острыми, словно зубья пиломеча, и рвут слух.
The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.
languages.original_text: Звуки закольцовываются в страшную петлю самоповтора, со скрежетом смешиваются, становятся высокими и острыми, словно зубья пиломеча, и рвут слух.

traits.locale_text: The sounds connect into a terrible loop of self-repetition, mix with a grinding sound, become high and sharp, like the teeth of a saw blade, and tear at the ears.
The sounds connect into a terrible loop of self-repetition, mix with a grinding sound, become high and sharp, like the teeth of a saw blade, and tear at the eardrums.
The sounds connect into a terrible loop of self-repetition, mix with a grinding sound, become high and sharp, like the teeth of a saw blade, and tear at the eardrums.
The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.
The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

languages.text: Les sons s'entrechoquent, devenant d'horribles boucles sans fin, mêlant grincements et crissements aigus semblables à une épée tronçonneuse qui vous déchire les tympans.
languages.original_text: The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

traits.locale_text: Les sons s'entrechoquent, devenant d'horribles boucles sans fin, mêlant grincements et crissements aigus semblables à des scies qui déchirent les tympans.

languages.text: 无数声音加入了合唱，组成了不断重复的恐怖循环，期间夹杂着什么东西被磨碎的声音，又响亮、又尖锐。这声音就像是链锯剑锋利的锯齿一样，不断撕扯着你的耳膜。
languages.original_text: The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

traits.locale_text: 无数声音连接在一起，组成了不断重复的恐怖循环，期间夹杂着什么东西被磨碎的声音，又响亮、又尖锐。这声音就像是锋利的锯齿一样，不断撕扯着你的耳膜。

languages.text: その音は恐ろしいほど繰り返されていった。きしる音と混ざり合い、チェーンソードの刃のように高く鋭くなり、鼓膜を引き裂いた。
languages.original_text: The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

traits.locale_text: その音は恐ろしいほど繰り返されていった。きしる音と混ざり合い、チェーンソードの刃のように高く鋭くなり、鼓膜を引き裂いた。

languages.text: Die Geräusche verbinden sich in einer schrecklichen, sich selbst wiederholenden Schleife und vermischen sich mit einem Knarzen, werden hochtönig und scharf – wie die Zähne eines Sägeblatts, als würden sie an deinem Trommelfell sägen.
languages.original_text: The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

traits.locale_text: Die Geräusche verbinden sich in einer unangenehmen, sich selbst wiederholenden Schleife und vermischen sich auch mit einem Knarzen, werden hochtönig und scharf – wie die Zähne eines Sägeblatts. Als würden sie am Trommelfell sägen.

languages.text: Los sonidos forman un terrible bucle cíclico, se mezclan con una especie de rechinamiento cada vez más agudo y ruidoso, como los dientes de una sierra circular que amenaza con reventarte los tímpanos.
languages.original_text: The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

traits.locale_text: Los sonidos conectan en un terrible bucle cíclico, se mezclan con una especie de rechinamiento cada vez más agudo y ruidoso, como los dientes de una sierra circular, hasta que tus tímpanos están a punto de reventar.

languages.text: Sesler; korkunç bir döngüye girmekle kalmıyor, gıcırtı sesiyle karışıyor. Motorlu kılıcın keskin dişini andırıp yükseliyor, âdeta kulak zarlarını patlatıyorlar.
languages.original_text: The sounds join in a terrible loop of self-repetition, mixing with a grinding sound, becoming high and sharp like the teeth of a chainsword and tearing at your eardrums.

traits.locale_text: Sesler; korkunç bir döngüye girmekle kalmıyor, gıcırtı sesiyle karışıyor. Motorlu kılıcın keskin dişini andırıyor ve yükseliyor, yükseliyor. Kulak zarlarını patlatıyor resmen.
